title: Diwali is certainly the biggest and the brightest festivals of all Hindu. It is the festival of lights...

attachments.displayName:
Diwali is certainly the biggest and the brightest festivals of all Hindu. It is the festival of lights, which literally enlightens the country with its brilliance and dazzles all with its joy. It is the celebration of life, its enjoyment, goodness and victory of good over evil. Sorms.in wishes you all a heartily felicitation on Diwali. Have a joyful and safe Diwali and drives away all evil spirits.

Sorms.in Wishes a Heartily Felicitation on DIWALI

object.content:
